reviews.review:
[h1]Portal and Partners[/h1]
It is said to have been inspired by [i]Narbacular Dorp[/i] and [i]The Power of paint[/i].
[list]
[*]The plot in single-person mode is tense and exciting, and the puzzles are clever.
[*]The two-person model requires close cooperation and brings a sense of accomplishment.
[/list]
Egg: Mod [i]Portal Reload[/i] has been released at Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1255980/Portal_Reloaded/
incredibly interesting game with many great and challenging puzzles

Very good overall, just like the first game. The puzzles are good from start to finish, and the newer things in the second half keep things fresh. There's an actual story this time around, and while I don't think that was something lacking in the first Portal, it's definitely a positive addition. The dry, sarcastic, and sometimes bad humour keeps it from getting too serious and just works. My one complaint is the same that I had with the first Portal. You go from having very defined progression to being completely in the dark, and in Portal 2 that cycle repeats. I don't think you need to know exactly how far along you are in a game at all times, but it's somewhat annoying when you think you're almost done and still have half the game left. It's definitely not a dealbreaker; just a little annoyance worth mentioning.
This is actually one of the greatest video games of all time and if you haven't played it you are poopoo head

This game was a blast! The characters, although few, are fun to listen to and laugh at. No matter what anyone says, this game has some of the most iconic moments and pieces of dialogue in gaming history. They're also making a movie soon; can't wait to see that! :D
Probably the best puzzle game ever

The game was so fun, definitely recommended.

Das Spiel ist gut. Mann sieht eine Deutlich Verbesserung zum ersten Teil und obwohl das Spiel jetzt schon ziemlich alt ist, ist die Grafik noch in tolleranten Bereich. Es macht auserdem ziemlichen Spa√ü und an einigen Stellen hat mann echt zu √ºberlegen. Ich w√ºrde das Spiel weiter empfehlen.

Die Story hat Tiefgang und regt zum R√§tsel und L√∂sen an.
Die Puzzle sind nicht besonders schwer.

Honestly, anyone who finds thrill and enjoyment though puzzle games will definitely have a blast playing this sequel. It‚Äôs puzzles are not easy sometimes, and will require you to stop and think thoroughly through which I think is great. The back story is interesting, and there are splats of humor here and there which really tie the package nicely. Finalizing this up, for people who are into puzzle/mystery types of games, I 99.9% recommend this game.
i really recommend playing portal 2 i have been playing the game since i was 4 years old the game is very nice

Not liking this game is a crime

Holy macaroni sticks this game is ssssssssssssssssooooooooooo cool and funny though the replay ability is lacking I still go back and play it just cause the dialog is so good and funny everything make sense the motivations of each character and why they do what they do and my god is it funny nearly every time weatly is on scene it cracks me up the times when he don't are when he is not making a joke and every joke lands for me the plot is go and it has a scene were the they tell you why the main antagonist is testing you and the ending is brilliant if you going in blind then you are in for a treat. I think that no I know I would pay $100 for this game holy cow. The sound track is the bomb I listen to the credits song and the quire song a lot. I recommend that you search it up on YouTube and the way they implement them is so cool. Well here we are again

Oh how we laughed and laughed
Except I wasn't laughing
Under the circumstances
I've been shockingly nice
You want your freedom? Take it
That's what I'm counting on
I used to want you dead
But now I only want you gone
She was a lot like you
Maybe not quite as heavy
Now little Caroline is in here too
One day they woke me up
So I could live forever
It's such a shame the same
Will never happen to you
You've got your short sad life left
That's what I'm counting on
I'll let you get right to it
Now I only want you gone
Goodbye my only friend
Oh, did you think I meant you?
That would‚Ä¶

Turns out the cake is still a lie

10/10

A great sequel to a revolutionary game. The single-player campaign is memorable and the co-op campaign is a lot of fun to play with someone who has the patience to solve the puzzles with you. It also supports player-made test chambers that you can play or create yourself. 

Give Portal 2 a try! You will enjoy it!
